This method will pass a Mouseevent to the planeclass to handle shooting.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class PlaneSprite
This method will set the fire to false, this is crucial in the in preventing the PlaneSprite from firing several bullet per frame.

moveDown() - Method in class EnemySprite
This will move the enemy sprite down, using the y speed it will move the sprite across the plane.
moveDown() - Method in class PlaneSprite
This method will move the PlaneSprite image on the canvas down on the y plane from it current location by 3.
moveLeft() - Method in class EnemySprite
This will move the the enemy sprite to the left, using the moveSpeed variable it move it by that number.
moveLeft() - Method in class PlaneSprite
This method will move the PlaneSprite image on the canvas over to the left by 3 on the x plane.
movePowerDown() - Method in class Powerup
This method will move the powerup down 3 points on the plane.

This method will move the enemy sprite to the right.
moveRight() - Method in class PlaneSprite
